original_text: In the second month of the year, a very large crowd of people came together in Jerusalem. They came there for the Festival of Flat Bread.
korean_text: 둘째 달에 백성이 무교절을 지키려 하여 예루살렘에 많이 모이니 매우 큰 모임이라

sentences.original_text: In the second month of the year
a very large crowd of people came together
They came there for the Festival of Flat Bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무교절을 지키기 위해 그곳에 왔습니다
